Complete your Pokémon nap squad with this Komala mini figure in an adorable sleeping pose. Known for never waking up, Komala is captured here hugging its log while snoozing on a soft blue cushion. Cute, compact, and detailed, it’s the perfect addition to any Pokémon collection.

Features:
- Compact size for easy display (fits in your palm)
- High-quality sculpt with anime-accurate details
- Features Komala cuddling its log while sleeping on a cushion
- Perfect for desks, shelves, or Pokémon displays
- A must-have for Pokémon fans and collectors

Bring home Komala today and let this sleepy Pokémon add cozy vibes to your collection!

entry.title: Pikachu Pokémon Figure - Iconic Electric-Type Collectible (8CM)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type: actiion figure
Price: 120.00

Bring home the world's most famous Pokémon with this electrifying 8CM tall Pikachu figure! This charming collectible perfectly captures the beloved Electric-type Pokémon in its classic, cheerful stance, featuring its iconic red cheeks and lightning-bolt tail.

Every detail is meticulously sculpted, from Pikachu's bright, eager eyes and adorable smile to the distinct black tips of its ears and the vibrant yellow of its fur. This premium figure is an absolute must-have for any devoted Pokémon fan, trainer, or collector, embodying the spirit and energy of the entire franchise.

Crafted from high-quality, durable PVC materials, this Pikachu figure is perfect for display on your desk, shelf, or alongside your other Pokémon companions. It's an ideal gift for fans of the Pokémon universe, both new and old, who appreciate high-quality, compact collectibles.

entry.title: Psyduck Streetwear Figure – 10cm Pokémon Collectible with Champion Hoodie & G-Shock Watch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type: actiion figure
Price: 120.00

Bring the chaos and the drip with this Psyduck Streetwear Figure. Standing at 10cm tall, this Pokémon collectible nails that dazed-but-drippy vibe with a black Champion hoodie, light joggers, and yellow kicks. Oh—and don’t miss the tiny G-Shock watch flexing on his wrist.

This is the streetwear icon for collectors who love their fashion with a bit of confusion. Whether on your desk or your display shelf, Psyduck’s bringing heat and headaches in equal measure.

🌀 Product Highlights:

  • Height: 10 cm (approx. 4 inches)

  • Psyduck with custom Champion hoodie & G-Shock watch

  • Urban-style sneakers in yellow/black

  • Durable finish for long-term display

  • A must-have for Pokémon collectors, sneakerheads & hypebeasts

🧢 Great Gift For:

  • Streetwear & sneaker fans

  • Psyduck lovers (and those who relate)

  • Pokémon & anime figure collectors

  • Hypebeasts who appreciate a little chaos
